How to Buy Bitcoin without a Bank Account

by Jordan Tuwiner

Although it may seem hard to buy bitcoin without a bank account, services that allow the unbanked to buy bitcoin often deliver your coins faster. Bitcoin Purchases made with cash deposit can have delivery times of under 2 hours. Bitcoin purchases made with credit/debit card or ACH transfer often have wait times of up to 5 days before the coins are delivered.

Bitcoin can be a great tool for the unbanked, so it's no surprise that many companies are focused on helping those with no bank account buy bitcoin.

BitQuick Buy Bitcoin

BitQuick provides escrow between buyers and sellers. Payments are made via cash deposit at bank locations across the U.S., and via SEPA transfer in the EU. Your coins will usually be delivered in under two hours if payment was made via cash deposit.

Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins provides escrow and offers a number of payment methods for buying bitcoin with no bank account. Cash deposit, Western Union, face-to-face cash trade, Amazon gift card are all offered on top of many other payment methods. Local Bitcoins provides escrow, but be sure to buy from sellers with previous trade history and positive feedback.

Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX lets you buy bitcoin with cash at a number of retail stores across the United States. You'll have to verify your identity before buying, making LibertyX less private than some of the other options. You can buy up to $1000 worth of bitcoin. You'll be charged a 1% fee on all purchases, but if you sign up with Facebook you can buy your first $1000 fee free. Your bitcoin should arrive a few minutes after your payment is made.

Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins is another company that helps match buyers and sellers, with all payments done via cash deposits. You can buy up to $2000 worth of bitcoin via cash deposit at a number of banks across the United States. After your cash deposit is made you'll usually receive your coins within 15 minutes.

Buy Bitcoin

expresscoin Buy Bitcoin

Expresscoin is a bitcoin broker geared towards those without a bank account. The company's only payment options at the moment are money order and personal check.

Buy Bitcoin

Mycelium Local Trader Buy Bitcoin

Mycelium is a Bitcoin wallet for iOS and Android. The Android version of the app has a "local trader" feature that helps connect you with locals who are selling Bitcoin. You can arrange to meet face-to-face and buy bitcoin with cash.

Buy Bitcoin

On top of the options listed above, it's always possible to buy bitcoin at your local meetup or from a local Bitcoin ATM. Use Coin ATM Radar to find a Bitcoin ATM in your area.

The availability of the services listed above may vary by location.
